SEARCH
Package bto.Data

Interface ProjectDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectCSVDao
public interface ProjectDao
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing project-related operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    decreaseAvailableUnits(String projectId, String flatType, int count)
    Decreases the available units for a specific flat type in a project.
    void
    deleteProject(String projectId)
    Deletes a project from the data source by its name.

    Retrieves all projects from the data source.

  • Method Details

    • saveProject

      void saveProject(Project project)
      Saves a new project to the data source.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to save.

    • updateProject

      void updateProject(Project project)
      Updates an existing project in the data source.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to update.

    • deleteProject

      void deleteProject(String projectId)
      Deletes a project from the data source by its name.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The name of the project to delete.

    • getAllProjects

      List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves all projects from the data source.
      Returns:
      A list of all projects.

    • getProjectById

      Project getProjectById(String projectId)
      Retrieves a project by its name.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The name of the project.
      Returns:
      The project if found.

    • decreaseAvailableUnits

      void decreaseAvailableUnits(String projectId, String flatType, int count)
      Decreases the available units for a specific flat type in a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The name of the project.
      flatType - The flat type to update.
      count - The number of units to decrease.
